segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen, a very detailed line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a daytime scene, with light coming in through a window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Three people are present: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a single-basin sink, and it's definitely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting down the cabinets and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of the woman's feet is already in the puddle, which is widening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice at all, which is quite astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely neutral, as if everything is perfectly normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, over to the left, a boy is precariously climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for a cookie jar in an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable; I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands next to him, anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
